""" UDF """

# Original SAS code:
# CASE WHEN (("&status." = "600") OR (UPCASE("&activiteit.")
# contains UPCASE('proces in de toekomst'))) THEN 1 /* Toekomst */ ELSE 0 /* Geen toekomst */ END
# Auto-generated pyspark code:
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType


@udf(returnType=IntegerType())
def cz_sas_br_t_dd_toekomst_idc(status, activiteit) -> int:
    if status == "600" or "proces in de toekomst" in activiteit.upper():
        result = 1  # Toekomst
    else:
        result = 0  # Geen toekomst
    return result
